mapper.update: UPDATE mem_baseinfo m SET m.balance = ( CASE WHEN m.balance + #{balance} < 0 THEN 0 WHEN m.balance + #{balance} >= 0 THEN m.balance + #{balance} END ), m.can_amount = ( CASE WHEN m.can_amount + #{canAmount} > 0 THEN m.can_amount + #{canAmount} WHEN m.can_amount + #{canAmount} <= 0 THEN 0 END ), m.total_bet = ( CASE WHEN m.total_bet + #{betAmount} > 0 THEN m.total_bet + #{betAmount} WHEN m.total_bet + #{betAmount} <= 0 THEN 0 END ), m.total_deposit = ( CASE WHEN m.total_deposit + #{rechargeAmount} > 0 THEN m.total_deposit + #{rechargeAmount} WHEN m.total_deposit + #{rechargeAmount} <= 0 THEN 0 END ), m.total_enchashment = ( CASE WHEN m.total_enchashment + #{cashAmount} > 0 THEN m.total_enchashment + #{cashAmount} WHEN m.total_enchashment + #{cashAmount} <= 0 THEN 0 END ) WHERE m.id = #{memId}
